DOC.brief_summary: This two-arm , randomize , double-blind , parallel-group , placebo-controlled study evaluate efficacy Enjuvia 0.3 mg tablet treatment moderate severe symptom vulvovaginal atrophy postmenopausal woman without hysterectomy and/or oophorectomy .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Evaluate Safety Efficacy Enjuvia 0.3 mg Treatment Vulvovaginal Atrophy
DOC.detailed_description: The study include screen period 4 week 12-week treatment period . The overall study duration participant approximately 16 week . Study participant undergo physical gynecological exam , blood test clinical laboratory assessment . All patient uterus undergo transvaginal ultrasound .
DOC.criteria: Naturally surgically postmenopausal Moderate severe symptom vaginal atrophy ( ie , dryness , itching , pain , uncomfortable intercourse ) Known sensitivity contraindication estrogens progestins History current diagnosis endometrial hyperplasia Recent history vaginal bleed unknown cause Recent history diagnosis endometriosis Any contraindication estrogen therapy
